remarks: This lemma proves that for all ` t ` in ` T ` there is a ` j ` as in the proof of [BrosowskiDeutsh] p. 91 (at the bottom of page 91 and at the top of page 92):  (j-4/3) * ε < f(t) <= (j-1/3) * ε , g(t) < (j+1/3) * ε, and g(t) > (j-4/3) * ε.  Here ` E ` is used to represent ε in the paper.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
statement:
